testcase.name: Successful checkout of products
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.........................................passed When the user enters the name "Lucas Garcia"................................passed And the user selects gender "Male"..........................................passed And the user selects country "Brazil".......................................passed And the user clicks on Let's Shop...........................................passed Then the user adds "PG 3" to the cart.......................................passed And the user adds "Jordan 6 Rings" to the cart..............................passed When the user goes to the cart..............................................passed Then the user should see the first product "PG 3" in the cart...............passed Then the user should see the second product "Jordan 6 Rings" in the cart....passed When the user agrees to the terms and completes the purchase................passed Then the purchase should be completed successfully..........................passed
